very good game, if you dont like hackers dont go on any community browser maps belive me i have met over 30 different hackers in 2 days in server but the game is really fun so play but dont hack if you suck, just take it easy and learn to play it belive me i used to suck but i used 10 or 15 hours in training in csgo so now im better than i was.
